Trade/Device Name(s): Copan FecalSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System
Specimen Container(s): Plastic screw-cap tube with conical bottom
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan FecalSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System for collecting and transporting rectal swab and fecal specimens to preserve enteric bacterial viability.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection of rectal swab and fecal specimens and preservation of enteric pathogenic bacteria viability during transport from collection site to laboratory, with specimens processed by standard laboratory culture procedures.
